Room.Name: Multi-Dimensional Spatial Rift
Room.ShortDescription: You see yourself standing between darkness and light.
Room.LongDescription: To the left you could see an endless field of whiteness and good. However, your right shoulder and leg stay in the blackness of evil. This is the place where good and evil meet trying to solve the oldest and everlasting conflict in the universe. You may not like some of the "beings" which could come from your right, but you may find yourself lucky and meet God without even bothering to die!
